about.title: About
about.description: Learn more about Scratch Modules Gallery
about.whatIsThisContent: Scratch Modules Gallery is a searchable collection of reusable Scratch code modules. It helps Scratchers find and use common programming patterns, utilities, and features to enhance their projects.
about.howToUseContent: Using modules from this gallery is easy:
about.step1: Search for the module you need using the search bar on the home page
about.step2: Click on a module to view its details, scripts, and documentation
about.step3: Copy the script code and paste it into your Scratch project (to be implemented)
about.contributeContent: This project is open source and welcomes contributions. You can add new modules, improve documentation, fix bugs, or suggest new features.

licenseContent.sourceCode: This project is open source under the GNU General Public License v3.0. See the LICENSE file in the repository for details.
licenseContent.modules: The module contents are copyrighted by their respective contributors. Unless otherwise stated, they are licensed under CC-BY-SA 4.0. If reference links are provided, they follow the license terms of those links. Some modules are sourced from the web; if there are any copyright issues, please contact me for removal.

about.thirdPartyLicensesContent: This project uses third-party open source libraries. View their licenses:
